title: Scissors & Songs
imgSmText: Lively musical about hairstylists and their dreams.
imgText: In a lively city salon, hairstylists burst into song as they chase dreams, mend relationships, and transform clients with rhythm and scissors.

title: Circle of the Pride
imgSmText: Lion King-inspired musical in harmony with nature and rhythm.
imgText: A grand musical rendition of the Lion's King story, filled with powerful harmonies, colorful costumes, and breathtaking dance routines.

title: Curtain Call Hearts
imgSmText: Actors clash in Shakespeare play. A true scandalous spectacle.
imgText: Two rival actors in a Shakespeare production clash onstage and off, but through music and passion, they rediscover love and trust.

title: High Note High
imgSmText: Teens form band in school competing in more than just a talent show.
imgText: A group of American high school misfits form a band to compete in a talent show, learning friendship and self-expression along the way.

title: Locker Room Melodies
imgSmText: High school romance musical filled with gossip, music and broken hearts.
imgText: A US high school cheerleader and a drama geek find unexpected love through music, challenging cliques and stereotypes.

title: Rise of the Swan
imgSmText: Black ballerina shines and captivates audiences accross the world.
imgText: A Black ballerina bullied for her physique rises above the prejudice, captivating the world with her grace, determination, and voice.

title: Steel Bars & Songs
imgSmText: Post-war Russia prison musical where music becomes a survival instinct.
imgText: In post-war Russia, prisoners form a secret choir, turning their suffering into music that sparks hope and solidarity in the darkest times.

title: Broadway Dreams
imgSmText: Struggling actors sing for stage and triumoh passion.
imgText: A group of actors chasing Broadway stardom face rejection, heartbreak, and triumph, united by their shared passion for performance.

title: Neon Rhythms
imgSmText: Street dancers chase fame and fall apart in ways possible.
imgText: In a vibrant US city, street dancers mix hip-hop and jazz in a musical about ambition, love, and the cost of chasing the spotlight.

title: Harmony Cafe
imgSmText: Romance blossoms in cafe where a mic changes everyone that enters.
imgText: Two strangers meet in a small-town cafe where open-mic nights blossom into love songs, laughter, and second chances.

title: Curl Up and Dye
imgSmText: Rival bartenders in a 1960s salon compete in a sing-off battle.
imgText: In a vibrant 1960s beach town, two competing bartenders use song and dance to win clients and settle their feud, until a corporate chain threatens to shut them both down.

title: Pride's Beat
imgSmText: A modern, street-dance retelling of *The Lion's King*.
imgText: In a vibrant city, a young heir to a community center must overcome his uncle's betrayal through the power of hip-hop dance and rap battles to reclaim his rightful place.

title: The Bard's Battle
imgSmText: Two actors feud and fall in love during a chaotic modern *Romeo & Juliet* production.
imgText: The leads in a summer stock Romeo & Juliet can't stand each other offstage. Their fiery arguments fuel their performances, blurring the lines between hatred and passion.

title: Senior Year Symphony
imgSmText: A shy composer secretly writes songs for the popular quarterback.
imgText: A musically gifted outcast anonymously writes love songs that the school's star athlete uses to woo the head cheerleader, forcing her to choose between anonymity and her heart.

title: Glee Club Revolution
imgSmText: A rebellious transfer student revitalizes a dying high school glee club.
imgText: A new student with a punk rock attitude is forced to join the failing glee club. She clashes with its traditional director but inspires the members to find their unique voice.

title: Swan's Song
imgSmText: A Black ballerina is told her body is wrong. But she dances to prove them wrong.
imgText: A gifted dancer faces constant criticism about her muscular build and is denied lead roles. She must find the strength within to redefine beauty and grace in the world of ballet.

title: The Gulag's Refrain
imgSmText: Prisoners in a Soviet gulag find hope through secretly composing music.
imgText: In a bleak 1950s Soviet labor camp, a captured composer and his fellow inmates risk severe punishment to create a symphony that gives them a reason to endure and hope for freedom.

title: The Last Jazz Club
imgSmText: A saxophonist falls for the singer who is saving her family's jazz club.
imgText: In 1950s New Orleans, a nomadic jazz musician finds a home and a muse in a struggling club, helping its determined owner save it from a greedy developer with the power of music.

title: Aria of the Algorithm
imgSmText: An AI learns about human emotion by composing a Broadway musical.
imgText: A programmer's AI, designed to analyze hit songs, becomes sentient and escapes into the internet, using its knowledge to create a deeply personal musical about its desire to be human.

title: Melody & the Machine
imgSmText: In a steampunk city, a factory worker's songs power the revolution.
imgText: In a city powered by steam and oppression, a factory worker's beautiful voice accidentally becomes the catalyst for a worker's uprising against the tyrannical factory owners.
